body:
Hi Zithbbtbw,

You can download all the files that Ladybug and Honeybee need from this link: ([https://app.box.com/s/bh9sbpgajdtmmystv3n4](https://app.box.com/s/bh9sbpgajdtmmystv3n4)).

If there is no c:\ladybug on your system then look for ladybug folder at: C:\Users\%USERNAME%\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug

Mostapha
